risk.model.playerutils

Interface IPlayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BotPlayerModel, HumanPlayerModel, PlayerModel

    public interface IPlayer
extends java.io.Serializable
    This interface contains the function that a player Human or Not must implement
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    hcanta

        Tuple<java.lang.String,Tuple<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> attack()
        Decides which country to attack
        Returns:
